title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Social Problem-Solving Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science concepts and digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducting Projects to Solve Complex Social Issues Step-by-Step in a VR Environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three main elements of Cognitive Load Theory (intrinsic/extrinsic/germane load) to real-world cases.
Independently implement information design strategies that account for working memory limitations in a simulation environment.
Analyze team efficiency in VR-based collaborative tasks using cognitive load measurement tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
